description.value:
Any creature who takes damage from the dragon's jaws, claws, or tail attack, or who Strikes and does damage to the dragon with an unarmed attack, takes @Damage[1d6[poison]] damage (@Damage[2d6[poison]|shortLabel] for ancient and archdragons) and must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:|options:inflicts:drained,inflicts:enfeebled] saving throw (DC equal to the DC of the dragon's Hydraulic Breath).

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature's enfeebled condition increases by 1 until the end of its next turn, to a maximum of 3. If the creature is already @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 3}, it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained]{Drained 1} instead.

Critical Failure As failure, except the creature's enfeebled condition increases by 2 instead of 1.
